mapper.select: SELECT id, drink, code, price, stock, ideal_stock_weekday, ideal_stock_weekend, order_date, drink_category FROM Items
SELECT id, drink, code, price, stock, ideal_stock_weekday, ideal_stock_weekend, order_date, drink_category FROM items WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items (drink, code, price, stock, ideal_stock_weekday, ideal_stock_weekend, order_date, drink_category) VALUES (#{drink}, #{code}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{ideal_stock_weekday}, #{ideal_stock_weekend}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{drink_category})
